node.title: Code as Craft (Etsy)
node.description: Etsy's technology blog. I've enjoyed their in-depth writeups which are often backed by comprehensive data and analysis.

node.title: Increment
node.description: A beautiful editorial website, focusing on a different software topic each issue.

node.title: Intercom
node.description: Big focus on product management and continuous delivery best practices.

node.title: Dropbox tech blog
node.description: Some particularly interesting reads about data at scale.

node.title: A List Apart
node.description: One of the most established and well respected authorities on web design, inclusivity and accessibility. Guest posts from many leading minds.

node.title: Michael Lopp
node.description: Literally wrote the book on engineering management. Great slack community too.

node.title: Run Less Software
node.description: The philosophy behind software development at Intercom.

node.title: Microservice testing
node.description: A comprehensive guide to testing strategies for microservices, helping to define exactly which system is under test at each stage.
